#summary One-sentence summary of this page.
This page gives a description on steps and commands necessary to configure and run modified Partysip in an hierarchical proxy mode. Corresponding reference information and
examples are provided as well. 

== Audience ==
This page is intended for users who want to startup a hierarchical p2p architecture by Bamboo DHT and run the modified Partysip as a proxy, but are not necessarily familier with configuration of Bamboo and Partysip under this mode. In addition, some familiarity with P2PSIP, [basic knowledge on configuring Bamboo and Partysip], as well as the understanding of hierarchical proxy mode is required.
